com.openfeint.api.resource
Class CurrentUser

java.lang.Object
  com.openfeint.internal.resource.Resource
      com.openfeint.api.resource.User
          com.openfeint.api.resource.CurrentUser

public class CurrentUser
extends User

The resource class that represents the current logged-in User in OpenFeint.

Constructor Detail

CurrentUser

public CurrentUser()
This constructor is used internally by OpenFeint. To get access to the CurrentUser, call OpenFeint.getCurrentUser().

Method Detail

befriend

public void befriend(User userToBefriend,
                     CurrentUser.BefriendCB cb)
Call this method to have the local User send a friend request to this User.

Parameters:
userToBefriend - the User to send a friend request to.
cb - The callback object that will be notified when befriend() completes.
